item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Lord High Magician Turloch
item.description: "You never know the truth until you have heard all the stories. As you never hear all the stories, you never know the whole truth." -- Lord High Magician Turloch

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Apple Computer Inc.
item.description: "Here's to the crazy ones. The misfits. The rebels. The troublemakers. The round pegs in the square holes. The ones who see things differently. They're not fond of rules. And they have no respect for the status quo. You can quote them, disagree with them, glorify or vilify them. About the only thing you can't do is ignore them. Because they change things. They push the human race forward. And while some may see them as the crazy ones, we see genius. Because the people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the ones who do." -- Apple Computer Inc.

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Charles Stross
item.description: "--but I find her personality annoying. It's like being molested by a sleeping bag that speaks in Comic Sans with little love-hearts over the i's." -- Charles Stross

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Charles Stross
item.description: "We are Bay Aryans from Berkeley: prepare to be reengineered in an attractive range of color schemes for your safety and comfort!" -- Charles Stross

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Charles Stross
item.description: "Any civilization where the main symbol of religious veneration is a tool of execution is a bad place to have children." -- Charles Stross

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by R. Scott Bakker
item.description: "Faith is the truth of passion. Since no passion is more true than another, faith is the truth of nothing." -- R. Scott Bakker

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by R. Scott Bakker
item.description: "Doubt begets understanding, and understanding begets compassion. Verily, it is conviction that kills." -- R. Scott Bakker

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Kent M. Keith
item.description:
"The Paradoxical Commandments
People are illogical, unreasonable, and self-centered. Love them anyway.
If you do good, people will accuse you of selfish ulterior motives. Do good anyway.
If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.
The good you do today will be forgotten tomorrow. Do good anyway.
Honesty and frankness make you vulnerable. Be honest and frank anyway.
The biggest men and women with the biggest ideas can be shot down by the smallest men and women with the smallest minds. Think big anyway.
People favor underdogs but follow only top dogs. Fight for a few underdogs anyway.
What you spend years building may be destroyed overnight. Build anyway.
People really need help but may attack you if you do help them. Help people anyway.
Give the world the best you have and you'll get kicked in the teeth. Give the world the best you have anyway." -- Kent M. Keith

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "Absolute power does not corrupt absolutely, absolute power attracts the corruptible." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "In 1054, the patriarch of Constantinople and the pope excommunicated each other. That was the end of holiness for both churches." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Those of us who are blamed when old for reading childish books were blamed when children for reading books too old for us." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Charles Stross
item.description: "MINUS TEN POINTS FOR PUBLIC NUDITY." -- Charles Stross

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "If you think anyone is sane you just don't know enough about them." -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Kristopher add a quote by Steve Jobs
